entry.title: Help wanted: translations
entry.summary: The discussion thread revolves around the topic of translating Bitcoin into various languages. One user mentions that the same string may need to be translated in different ways depending on its context, and this could be the reason for some duplicate translations. The conversation then shifts to the use of Transifex as a tool for translation efforts, and one user exports all .ts files to the platform. Another user requests the addition of Norwegian Bokm√•l language to the list and offers to help with the translation. Overall, the thread highlights the importance of considering context in translations and the use of tools like Transifex for efficient translation efforts.
